name: JetBall Arena
description: In this futuristic sports game you can use your jetpack to fly around and try to score points by scoring goals. Each goal area varies in size with smaller goals worth more points.How to playUse your jetpack to fly around each arena, and control your speed using the thrust button. Each player can capture the ball by using their tractor beam, or try to dislodge the ball from another player by firing their weapon. If the ball has been captured the player can fire the ball at a target by releasing it from the tractor beam. The player can also score by ramming the ball, or hitting it with a weapon hit (propelling the ball into a goal area).ControlsEach player can use the keyboard to control their jetpack, but a gamepad is definitely recommended.
